attributes.action: ban all forms of car advertising which encourage driving at speed for fun.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a time when we need to reduce fossil CO2 emissions it is irresponsible for the government to allow the marketing of cars (which are >99% fossil fueled at the moment) on the basis of speed and exhilerating driving.

Furthermore, the number of deaths on our roads would be reduced if car advertising did not make reckless driving appear to be socially acceptable.
